publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4304 Cathy Jamieson: Congratulations to Alan Dunlop—That the Parliament congratulates Alan Dunlop on his appointment as the Victor L Regnier Visiting Chair for the 2009-10 academic year at Kansas State University; notes Mr Dunlop’s award winning work, which includes Glasgow’s Hazelwood School; believes that this appointment will further bolster the growing reputation of Scottish architecture, and wishes Mr Dunlop well in his post.

S3M-4304 Cathy Jamieson: Congratulations to Alan Dunlop—That the Parliament congratulates Alan Dunlop on his appointment as the Victor L Regnier Visiting Chair for the 2009-10 academic year at Kansas State University; notes Mr Dunlop’s award winning work, which includes Glasgow’s Hazelwood School; believes that this appointment will further bolster the growing reputation of Scottish architecture, and wishes Mr Dunlop well in his post.
S3M-4304 Congratulations to Alan Dunlop (lodged on 3 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*
